cookingTips: Trim fiddleheads and rinse thoroughly to remove brown papery skin
Use high heat to achieve light browning while keeping centers tender
Vinegar provides bright acidity that balances the earthy flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the unique texture and seasonal nature of fiddleheads. Guide proper cleaning technique and demonstrate how quick cooking preserves their delicate character.
